purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers (CFP) for accepted workshops at the ACM/IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS 2025), which will take place from October 5-10, 2025, in Grand Rapids, Michigan. It provides details about the hybrid format of the event, important dates for submissions, and a list of accepted workshops along with their descriptions and organizers. The workshops aim to facilitate discussions and collaborations on various topics related to model-driven engineering.
evidence_sentences: MODELS 2025, including the workshops, will be organized as a hybrid event with in-person and virtual participation.
MODELS 2025 will host a number of workshops during the three days before the main conference.
A list of the accepted workshops is available below, with links to workshop websites.
Please check the summary of workshops and the upcoming deadlines.
Important dates: Thu 3 Jul 2025 Submissions Deadline.
